name: Sheraton Senggigi Beach Resort

reviews.text: We spent 8 nights at the Sheraton Senggigi Beach resort, 2 adults, 2 children, in 2 adjoined connected rooms. Even though the rooms do need a facelift, this was some of the best service we have experienced in our 5 years living and travelling through Asia. The rooms are spaceous and comfortable, and with a great view, the beach was clean with great white sand, and the food was very good, with very good variety. We hired a car to tour the island at the transportation desk, and also hired a diving instructor and snorkling guide, all of them very good experiences. But the best was the quality of the service...our daughters have food allergies, and the entire staff of the hotel became aware instantly, and were always careful...the person cleaning the room, the amazing servers at the bar and restaurant, the staff at the spa, and the very friendly and professional people at the front desk, all deserve a round of applause for surprising and delighting us at every turn. We are definitely coming back.
reviews.title: Martin G - Family Trip

reviews.text: We spent 7 nights at the Sheraton Senggigi Beach Resort. We had an "executive suite" that was extremely comfortable and spacious with a nice balcony and sea-view providing lovely sunsets. Fresh flowers and a fresh fruit basket were nice touches. The property is more than 20 years old and it seems to be very well maintained (especially the beautifully manicured gardens, pool, and beach) although I think management has plans for redecoration of the rooms, which is a good idea!
reviews.title: A perfect week in laid-back Lombok

reviews.text: The top things we loved about this Sheraton Resort are:
reviews.title: the best beds ever

reviews.text: 1. FRIENDLY STAFF - Could the staff at this resort be any more attentive, helpful, respectful, and friendly? The service in all areas of the hotel was EXCEPTIONAL!
reviews.title: Dream Come True

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: 2. POOLSIDE DINING - the ambiance at the poolside restaurant is lovely and it is made even better with nightly live entrainment by Indonesian music artists.
reviews.title: Five star excellence

reviews.text: I spent five days here at the end of September to get acclimated before going onto a week-long dive trip farther east and found this to be a very easy, pleasant place.
reviews.title: Easygoing comfort

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel does show its age, but not unduly so. I was staying in a room on the third floor of the fourth building, and it was very quiet. There is some noise from the main road but only by the front door. Once you're in the room itself, it's very peaceful. The a/c worked well as did all the other fixtures and plumbing. It was only a shower, but that was no big deal. Everything was clean enough (admittedly not spotless). Moreover, I found the staff to be quite helpful and friendly.
reviews.title: A Slice of Slightly Faded Luxury

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The beach is quite private, ie, not many peddlers/hawkers, although the water was not as nice as some of the reviews put it. (There was a bit of trash--plastic bags, bottles, etc--floating around.) The pool is quite shaded and noisy, owing to families on holiday with small children so I found the beach more relaxing.
reviews.title: Peaceful stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The spa is on the beach and has a good range of services -- all very reasonably priced. They're not the best if you want a hard, deep tissue massage, but it's good enough to relax you.
reviews.title: Comfortable relaxation

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The drive from the airport does take a while -- about 75 to 90 minutes during the daytime, about an hour late at night -- as they're repairing part of the road. But Senggigi at least offers some decent dining choices on the main drag as well as other tourist services (diving, transport, treks, etc).
reviews.title: Beautiful Resort, Great Service

reviews.text: Senggigi Beach is one of the go-to locations while in Lombok. That's what we were told by the guide when going to Lombok for company gathering.
reviews.title: One of the Best Hotel at Senggigi

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at Sheraton Senggigi. The room is nice and I got the room that faced the garden. A short walk and you'll find yourself at the beach, which was semi-private.
reviews.title: An Oldie but a Goodie

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The bed is quite comfortable. The bathroom is nice, though there is a really big mirror that "captures" the door when it's opened. So be careful if you don't want to break the mirror!! I don't know whether it's standard in other room. One complaint, the water from the pipes is a bit salty.
reviews.title: Excellent stay in Senggigi

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Breakfast was nice, with good selections. I also had BBQ dinner there, which is recommended. The pool was nice and had creative shape.
reviews.title: Excellent hospitality and breakfast!

reviews.text: Note: Didn't try the spa. I travelled December 2008.
reviews.title: Extended Family Time-out

reviews.text: My wife, son and I stayed recently for 4 nights, the hotel arranged transportation from the airport which went smoothly. Check in was good despite a mix up on the room bedding requirements and no real delay. I somewhat expected the rooms to be a bit old from past review I had read but found it to be large and very comfortable/clean with no signs of ageing.
reviews.title: Great value
Good vibes
reviews.text: The staff were especially helpfull and cheerful through out the hotel, the tour desk were great and their prices reasonable, on my wifes birthday they arranged a cake and a band to deliver it by which made her day, all in all we would definalty stay there again.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: As others have mentioned the hotel isn't spanking new but there were people doing some paintwork to the wooden railings during our stay. So some rejuvenation going on I suppose.
reviews.title: An Oldie but a Goodie

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had a room near the pool. The room was roomy; the large mirror in the bath served to amplify the space visually, a nice touch. I had the same thought whether the door would crash into the mirror but for ours there's some rubber stop IIRC. Hot shower with good water pressure.
reviews.title: Pleasant experience but needs upgrading

reviews.text: There's a coffee dripping machine thingy and coffee bags for them, nice for coffee drinkers. There's no separate boiler for just hot water, though the coffee machine does make some coffee-flavoured hot water in a pinch.
reviews.title: Sheraton Lombok

description: Sheraton Senggigi Beach Resort, an idyllic tropical retreat in Lombok. Enjoy a comfortable getaway amidst plentiful sun, sand and surf. Ideally located on Senggigi Beach, the lush western coast of Lombok, the resort is just a short walking distance of the town’s shops, restaurant, bars and merely 75-minutes drive from Lombok International Airport.Feel the warmth of Sheraton at your perfect tropical escape at the Sheraton Senggigi Beach Resort.
